creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: small hut with thatched roof on risers at bottom center; crooked trees with dots and dashes for leaves and a rocky cliff at R; towering, rocky mountains in background with waterfall at L; short inscription URC with two small square stamps just L of inscription; trees colored with light wash of greenish blue; rocks and mountains lightly colored with brown, grey, and green; mounted to powder blue mat
markings: URC, small square intaglio stamp; URC, small square relief stamp; on mount: Clark collection sticker
medium: Ink and colors on mica paper
title: Lofty Recluse Amid Streams and Mountains
